OASIS xNAL (extensible Name and Address Language) standard

section.p: xNAL, an OASIS standard, is a structured XML language for representing names and addresses. xNAL is governed by the OASIS Customer Information Quality (CIQ) Technical Committee.
xNAL consists of basic constructs that can form complex names and addresses. These constructs can be used for name and address data exchange or storage.
